TopicTitle: Mission tasks for R&D - good examples from Apollo history..

Articles.Content:
I really liked the article on arstechnica today and I was hoping the Squad had seen it:

http://arstechnica.com/science/2013/08/what-might-have-been-visiting-mars-and-venus-with-apollo-era-hardware/

It gives a great description of the types of science tasks they could use for the upcoming R&D implementation. Just thought I'd share and see if anyone else caught it.

Also one important suggestion.... for the unlock process it should be noted that the Kerbals should collect Science!tm (or somthing) and not just science. A subtle yet very effective difference.

for Science!tm (or somthing)
